title: Bertucci M-1S Women's Field Watch
features: US Patented 30 mm brushed finish solid stainless case offers extreme durability and comfort

The GType Comfort-Webb band is a Bertucci proprietary woven blend of nylon and other fibers to create a webbing band that is very smooth to the touch, pliable, and offers long lasting durability. The Comfort-Webb band will custom form to your wrist to optimize fit and comfort.
Scratch resistant hardened mineral glass crystal
Ergonomically offset at 4 o'clock screw down crown. Rugged screw down case back
description: The M-1S Women’s Field brushed stainless steel case offers a classic, traditional look, but with that something extra. The M-1S offers the same performance features of every Bertucci watch in a case designed for women. The dial features easy to read high contrast numbers. The DX3 Nylon band is ultra comfortable and fits all women’s wrist sizes.
